section.title: Introduction
section.para: The Core Library aims at providing the basic functionality for people writing C++ portable applications.
C++ is a language with a lot of possibilities, but basic things are lacking.
This library aims at remaining as simple and basic as possible, while provinding very useful portable features.
When the Next C++ strandard will be rolled out, some of these features might be obsolete, and will be replaced by the new standard way to do.

section.title: Road Map
section.para: Even if the feature set is not completely closed yet, the goal must be quite simple to be able to achieve it with our current resources. Core aims at providing everything thats mandatory to develop a console based application, cross-platform, with C++, easily, and with distribution / messaging capabilities
